name: MyThing
0:
”Alexa open my thing”
”turn light on”
”turn light off”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my thing
des: Alexa skills demo to establish communication between ESP8266 and Thingspeak. The simple demo demonstrates and enables ESP8266 to turn off/off a light switch.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
